steps.content: Airy Aquarius is independent, preferring sex with no strings attached. steps.content: Libras are passionate and fun-loving, just like Sagittarius. steps.title: Pisces is more emotional, while Sagittarius just wants to have fun.
steps.content: Pisces is more emotional, while Sagittarius just wants to have fun. In a sexual relationship, a Pisces tends to form deep, emotional bonds, which can be a strange concept to the more casual Sagittarius. However, a Pisces is also willing to do almost anything in the bedroom, as long as you ask nicely. Sagittarius is one of the least committed signs out there. If the Pisces is looking for something serious, this pairing might not work out. Sagittariuses are also infamous social butterflies, which can be frustrating to the more committed Pisces. The Pisces may not appreciate the Sagittarius’ desire to talk to and form connections with everyone they meet. steps.title: Scorpio is the one sign that can teach Sagittarius a thing or two in bed.
steps.content: Scorpio is the one sign that can teach Sagittarius a thing or two in bed. Sagittarius will welcome Scorpio’s sexy, passionate energy, as long as it’s not too much for them to handle. steps.title: Virgor’s prim and proper nature doesn’t mesh well with Sag’s free spirit.
steps.content: Virgor’s prim and proper nature doesn’t mesh well with Sag’s free spirit. In bed, Virgos are open to experimentation, and they’re often willing to try anything once. Sagittarius tends to bring out the wild side in Virgo, especially when it comes to sex. However, that’s not always what the Virgo wants, so they may be resistant to Sagittarius’s charm.

steps.content: Cancers tend to assume too much about Sag’s actions in the bedroom. While Cancers can be great lovers, they’re also prone to intense mood swings that can turn a Sagittarius off. steps.title: Taurus tends to be calm and cool, not passionate and fiery.
steps.content: Taurus tends to be calm and cool, not passionate and fiery. The chill, earthy Taurus has trouble matching Sagittarius’s energy when it comes to sex.
